---
title: from_10xh5_to_h5mu
---

Converts a 10x h5 into an h5mu file.


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/convert/from_10xh5_to_h5mu/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description       |Attributes                          |
|:----------|:-----------------|:-----------------------------------|
|`--input`  |Input h5 file     |file, required, example: "input.h5" |
|`--output` |Output h5mu file. |file, example: "output.h5mu"        |
:::
